name: worshipfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows great respect or admiration for someone or something : Tech entrepreneurs are often worshipfully described as visionaries. Now a best-selling author, Julie speaks worshipfully of her former teacher, who instilled in her a love for writing.
More examplesFewer examplesAt the entrance to the building was a portrait of the company's founder for employees to gaze upon worshipfully. The king's grateful subjects can be seen gazing worshipfully at his statue in the foreground of the painting.
